verses.verse: And it came to pass a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> from all their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, that Joshua <S%H3091><s%> grew old <S%H2204><s%> and stricken <S%H935><s%> in age <S%H3117><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and for their elders <S%H2205><s%>, and for their heads <S%H7218><s%>, and for their judges <S%H8199><s%>, and for their officers <S%H7860><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2204><s%>, I am old and stricken <S%H935><s%> in age <S%H3117><s%>:

And you have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> unto all these nations <S%H1471><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you <S%H3068><s%>; for the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> is he that has fought for you <S%H3898><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%>, I have divided <S%H5307><s%> unto you by lot these nations <S%H1471><s%> that remain <S%H7604><s%>, to be an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for your tribes <S%H7626><s%>, from Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, with all the nations <S%H1471><s%> that I have cut off <S%H3772><s%>, even unto the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> westward <S%H3996><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he shall expel <S%H1920><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and drive them from out of your sight <S%H6440><s%>; and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> their land <S%H776><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has promised unto you <S%H1696><s%>.

Be you therefore very <S%H3966><s%> courageous <S%H2388><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> all that is written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, that you turn <S%H5493><s%> not aside therefrom to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left <S%H8040><s%>;

That you come <S%H935><s%> not among these nations <S%H1471><s%>, these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you <S%H2142><s%>; neither make mention of the name <S%H8034><s%> of their gods <S%H430><s%>, nor cause to swear <S%H7650><s%> by them <S%H5647><s%>, neither serve them <S%H7812><s%>, nor bow yourselves unto them:
But cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, as you have done <S%H6213><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has driven out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you great <S%H1419><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and strong <S%H6099><s%>: but as for you <S%H376><s%>, no man has been able to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>: for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, he it is that fights <S%H3898><s%> for you <S%H1696><s%>, as he has promised you.
Take good <S%H3966><s%> care <S%H8104><s%> therefore unto yourselves <S%H5315><s%>, that you love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

Else if you do in any wise <S%H7725><s%> go back <S%H7725><s%>, and cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of these nations <S%H1471><s%>, even these that remain <S%H7604><s%> among you <S%H2859><s%>, and shall make marriages with them <S%H935><s%>, and go in unto them, and they to you:

Know <S%H3045><s%> for a certainty <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will no more <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any of these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6341><s%>; but they shall be snares and traps <S%H4170><s%> unto you <S%H7850><s%>, and scourges in your sides <S%H6654><s%>, and thorns <S%H6796><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, until you perish <S%H6><s%> from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you <S%H5414><s%>.

And <S%H3117><s%>, behold, this day I am going <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>: and you know <S%H3045><s%> in all your hearts <S%H3824><s%> and in all your souls <S%H5315><s%>, that not one <S%H259><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> has failed <S%H5307><s%> of all the good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> concerning you <S%H935><s%>; all are come to pass unto you <S%H259><s%>, and not one thing <S%H1697><s%> has failed there <S%H5307><s%>.

Therefore it shall come to pass <S%H2896><s%>, that as all good things <S%H1697><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon you <S%H3068><s%>, which the Lord your God <S%H430><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>; so shall the Lord bring <S%H935><s%> upon you all evil <S%H7451><s%> things <S%H1697><s%>, until he have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you from off this good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H127><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given you <S%H5414><s%>.

When you have transgressed <S%H5674><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H1980><s%>, and have gone and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> yourselves to them <S%H639><s%>; then shall the anger of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against you <S%H6><s%>, and you shall perish quickly <S%H4120><s%> from off the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he has given unto you <S%H5414><s%>.
